title: Jeff Benedict: "Tiger Woods"
description: Just in time for his reappearance at The Masters, Listen to Michael's 2018 interview with Jeff Benedict, co-author (with Armen Keteyian) of "Tiger Woods." The book became a NY Times bestseller. Original air date 28 March 2018. The book was published on 27 March 2018.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Jeff Benedict, Michael Smerconish, TC Scornavacchi)
